search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Recruit CRM (recruitcrm.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page URL for Recruit CRM is: [https://recruitcrm.io/pricing](https://recruitcrm.io/pricing) .

extracted_content.content:
Pay for results, not promises.
------------------------------

Our pricing reflects unmatched value. Start free, and experience limitless potential.

Billed monthly Billed yearly Save up to 20%

### Pro

Ideal for beginner recruiters/recruitment agencies

per user / month

*   Chrome Sourcing Extension
*   AI Resume Parser
*   GPT Integration
*   Unlimited email templates
*   Fully integrated mailbox
*   Deal Pipelines

*   Phone calling & recording

Calling credit needs to be purchased separately and pricing per minute varies by country.

*   Complete Reporting Suite
*   Unlimited open jobs
*   Job board posting
*   AI Job Candidate Matching

### Business

Ideal for established firms looking to scale

Most popular

per user / month

*   Everything on the Pro plan
*   Automated email sequencing
*   Bulk texting
*   Executive Search Report Generator
*   Resume formatting
*   Custom roles & teams
*   Multiple hiring pipelines
*   Whitelist IP address
*   Audit Logs
*   Single Sign On (SSO)
*   2 email connections

### Enterprise

Ideal for firms with  
100+ users

per user / month \*  
(Annual billing only)

*   Everything on the business plan
*   Dedicated Account Manager
*   Custom SLA
*   Custom branding
*   Dedicated servers
*   Custom company, candidates & contact limits
*   \* Annual billing only

Take your recruitment to the next level with our powerful add-ons
-----------------------------------------------------------------

With a dedicated account manager by your side, you’ll have all the support you need to easily leverage these powerful features stress-free.

Workflow Automation
-------------------

*   No-code customized workflows
*   Syncs with 1000+ apps
*   Automations beyond the Recruit CRM space
*   Fully managed service
*   \* Tasks are only consumed when our bot successfully executes actions for you.

Job Multiposting & Advertising
------------------------------

*   Access to 5000+ channels to publish jobs
*   Get the list of recommended job boards based on filled-in details
*   Track campaign status details
*   Connect your own job board accounts for direct posting
*   \* One credit is utilized when posting a job on one or more of the job boards added by the user for a job campaign.

Advanced Analytics
------------------

*   Custom reports
*   Smart alerts & notifications
*   Role-based access
*   Free expert support to setup reports
*   Shareable dashboards
*   \* Billed per user based on the total number of users you have in Recruit CRM.

LinkedIn Messages Integration
-----------------------------

*   Send and receive LinkedIn messages directly from Recruit CRM
*   Keep all LinkedIn conversations synced in one place
*   View the message histories of other teammates
*   Ensure the candidate/contact’s profile includes their LinkedIn URL.
*   \* Billed per user based on the total number of users you have in Recruit CRM.

Don’t commit without being entirely sure
----------------------------------------

Schedule a personalized demo with our product experts to explore Recruit CRM and make the right choice before switching.

![Image 1: BANNER 1 1](blob:http://localhost/d54301fe151149b61549cca1527e42e2)

### Hear out what our customers have to say about us!

We switched from Bullhorn ATS & CRM to Recruit CRM because the former was old-fashioned and clunky. We wanted something more modern and smooth. It has all the functionalities we could want, including extras that we haven’t had with other CRMs, like parsing from LinkedIn.

Jordan O’Neill (London)Head of Talent Research- Reflection X

![Image 2: Jordan O’Neill (London)](blob:http://localhost/b25cc9c5a99421dcf29d28aaf3aa34b7)

Recruit CRM is the easiest and most customizable ATS/CRM I have ever used. I’ve worked in the recruitment industry for over 20 years and have used more systems than I can remember. On top of an incredible software platform, their customer service is hands down THE best!

Paul Diaz (Washington DC)Founder- Hire Power Consulting

![Image 3: Paul Diaz (Washington DC)](blob:http://localhost/57e5f38e84299a1dafa5be8ebe283bbe)

If you need anything, the team is available to help in no time at all. This is the most versatile system out there, and I have trialed a lot! It’s intuitive and very user-friendly. They are constantly updating and making the system even better.

Phoebe Chadwick (London)Director- Dot Recruitment

![Image 4: Phoebe Chadwick (London)](blob:http://localhost/ca20701a43e3054720e957a660ec9fcd)

I’ve used Bullhorn, I’ve used Pipedrive, I’ve used Zoho Recruit, and they are all kind of lackluster. They don’t deliver a product that solves our problems and the solutions we need. Recruit CRM is the first product that I’ve seen that’s actually built by recruiters for recruiters. The user interface is very user-friendly since many recruiters aren’t the most tech-savvy people.

Brennen JacksonCVO- MMI Industries

![Image 5: Brennen Jackson](blob:http://localhost/50242111964a34de37d60549999cb0e5)

Have questions? Clear your doubts
---------------------------------

Please use the chat icon at the bottom right. We are always there to help you.

How long does Recruit CRM’s free trial last?

Unlike other recruiting software, Recruit CRM provides an unlimited free trial. You can fully explore the platform, test its capabilities, and decide if it fits your recruitment needs. While the trial period is unlimited, certain usage limits do apply. Also, no credit card is required to start the trial.

Can I cancel my subscription anytime?

Yes, you can cancel your subscription anytime you want. In addition, you can export your data from Recruit CRM with just a few clicks—no strings attached.

Can I migrate my data from my existing system to Recruit CRM?

Getting your data from your existing systems to Recruit CRM is very simple. You have 2 options:

1.  Free – You can use our built-in Excel/CSV import tool to import candidates, companies/clients, and notes linked to them.
2.  Paid – You can hire our team of expert data migration engineers to take all your data and bring it into Recruit CRM. This service is priced based on the amount of data you need to import and takes between 10-14 business days to complete.

Is Recruit CRM GDPR Compliant?

Is my data secure?

All data entered into Recruit CRM is stored in world-class data centres managed by Amazon Web Services and encrypted using AES-256 bit encryption, the global industry standard for internet data security. We also regularly back up your data.

Join the tribe of 27,000+ recruiters to unlock insider recruitment news, strategies, and insights in our newsletter that set you apart.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Recruit CRM offers flexible and scalable pricing plans designed for modern recruitment challenges. Find your solution today.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: The free trial is unlimited but has certain usage limits.

additional_fees.fee_description: Paid data migration service priced based on the amount of data to import.
